title: Where have the bounties gone??
body: With the new health bar update I have noticed that the bounty flare thingy on the side of the health bar, that you got when you got multiple kills in a row has gone? Does anyone know why, or if it's coming back?

replies.body: Do me a favor and try running a quick repair to make sure that the game files pertaining to those gold bounties are still working properly. I've heard the game team mention that they weren't removed and should still be working so this might just be related to improperly working game files.
